Here is the elevator pitch for PREVENT-IA:

"Imagine a workplace where employees are empowered with the knowledge and skills to prevent accidents and stay safe. PREVENT-IA is an AI-powered education platform that makes it happen. With our cutting-edge technology, we provide on-site training, personalized learning paths, and real-time monitoring to ensure workers are equipped to prevent occupational risks. Unlike traditional training methods, PREVENT-IA is dynamic, flexible, and accessible, making it the perfect solution for companies looking to reduce accidents and improve their safety record. By using PREVENT-IA, you can rest assured that your employees are well-prepared to handle any situation, and your company is protected from the financial and reputational costs of accidents. Join the PREVENT-IA revolution and take the first step towards a safer, more productive workplace."
